channel.title: What the heck?
channel.description: The other day I was 68 reputation and now I am 0? How did this happen?

item.title: What the heck?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

At are school we had a cool teacher that we called the phone Nazi. I am going to call Niall a Rep Nazi for catching all these people.

[quote=“Explisionist, post:4, topic:316121”][quote author=Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS link=topic=412698.msg3041094#msg3041094 date=1259115452]
I did not o.O
[/quote]

Don’t lie.

Rep plz =D

Also, a admin or global mod probably looked at ur rep logs, or someone reported you for it.[/quote]

Also how dumb can people be? Rep plz? really are you even serious.

Read full topic

item.title: What the heck?
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:10, topic:316121”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=412698.msg3041227#msg3041227 date=1259120976]

Rep plz =D

That looks to be the problem. I would have done it if I had seen it, but since it wasn’t me it must have been Niall, Lothy, or Waffendennis.

What about Algas?
[/quote]

Possibly. He was known as the rep nazi back at the kaitnieks.com forums. :D[/quote]
Lol
Glad to see ur posting on mscp topics instead of just viewing ur created threads

Also Most likely it was Niall, he seems to be handling all the rep stuff, he has removed so many peoples rep due to abuse…

Read full topic

item.title: What the heck?
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:

I did not o.O

Don’t lie.

Rep plz =D

Also, a admin or global mod probably looked at ur rep logs, or someone reported you for it.
[/quote]
That’s not asking for rep, I helped the person and said “Rep plz =D” because they offered it for anyone who would help them, in which I did.[/quote]

We call that askin for rep over yonder. Also l2quote.
